{"id":1180513390,"question_id":3241,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â weeks","timestamp":1708399232,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"220 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1180513390/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Array Into Arrays With Max Difference","memory":"142.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> divideArray(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        vector<vector<int>> ans;\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){\n            if(i % 3 == 0) ans.push_back({});\n            ans.back().push_back(nums[i]);\n        }\n        for(auto v: ans){\n            int mi = v[0], ma = v[2];\n            if(ma - mi > k) return {};\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-array-into-arrays-with-max-difference","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
